description: Experience the perfect balance of warmth and comfort with Smartwool's PhD® Snow Medium socks. With Smartwool's Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, their Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort, and our 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit, these are one of Smartwool's thickest snow socks. And they're ready for all the snow-filled activities on your itinerary.
name: Smartwool PhD Snow Medium Socks - Mens
